data: undefined (In 1953 a group of marines from The American Sixth Fleet took on a local team from Rafelbunyol in a football match which mirrored, in real life, the fictional atmosphere envisaged in the film "Bienvenido, Mr. Marshall".)

In 1953 a group of marines from The American Sixth Fleet took on a local team from Rafelbunyol in a football match which mirrored, in real life, the fictional atmosphere envisaged in the film "Bienvenido, Mr. Marshall".
